meanings.definition: A person or thing regarded as a representative symbol or as worthy of veneration.
meanings.sent1: In our culture, superheroes are considered icons of bravery.
meanings.sent2: The national flag is an icon that represents our country.
meanings.sent3: The little girl saw her teddy bear as an icon of comfort.
meanings.sent4: The ancient tree stood as an icon of wisdom in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse became an icon of hope for sailors in the storm.

meanings.definition: A small picture or symbol on a computer screen that represents a program or function.
meanings.sent1: Click on the shopping cart icon to view your items.
meanings.sent2: The email icon is usually located at the top of the screen.
meanings.sent3: The battery icon on my phone always reminds me to charge it.
meanings.sent4: The printer icon on the desktop made it easy to find the printing option.
meanings.sent5: The camera icon helped me access the photo gallery on my device.

meanings.definition: A religious painting depicting Jesus Christ, the Virgin Mary, saints, and angels.
meanings.sent1: The church displayed an icon of Saint Peter near the altar.
meanings.sent2: The icon of the Last Supper is a famous religious painting.
meanings.sent3: The icon of the Nativity scene brought a smile to the children's faces.
meanings.sent4: The icon of the Annunciation beautifully depicted the angel Gabriel.
meanings.sent5: The icon of the Ascension showed Jesus rising into the heavens.
